EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}ee # title [My new title]** ~ Updates the title.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}ee # background [Image URL]** ~ VIP Servers can change the background with an image URL.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}ee # description [My new description]** ~ Updates the description.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}ee # attendees #** ~ Updates max amount of attendees.
EXTENDED_LINE_5: **{{prefix}}ee # repeat** ~ Updates whether this event will repeat once it is ended.
EXTENDED_LINE_6: **{{prefix}}ee # remove** ~ Updates whether the event will remove all attendees and RSVP statuses when the event ends.
EXTENDED_LINE_7: **{{prefix}}ee # dm** ~ Updates whether or not to send DM reminders for this event.
EXTENDED_LINE_8: **{{prefix}}ee # platform [My new platform]** ~ Updates the platform.
EXTENDED_LINE_12: **{{prefix}}ee # frequency 1h** ~ Set the time interval of how often the event repeats.
EXTENDED_LINE_13: **{{prefix}}ee # duration 30m** ~ Updates how long the event will last?
EXTENDED_LINE_15: **{{prefix}}ee # alertrole [@Role]** ~ Adds/removes a role from being @ when the event starts.
EXTENDED_LINE_16: **{{prefix}}ee # allowedrole []** ~ Sets which roles are allowed to participate in this event.
EXTENDED_LINE_17: **{{prefix}}ee # template [Template Name]** ~ Sets this event as a template with a unique name.
EXTENDED_LINE_18: **{{prefix}}ee # showattendees** ~ Enables/disable showing attendees on the card..
TITLE_UPDATED: The events title has been updated.
TAGS_UPDATED: The events tags has been updated.
VIP_BACKGROUND: The backgrounds of an event can only be updated on a VIP server.
BACKGROUND_UPDATED: The events background image has been updated.
DESCRIPTION_UPDATED: The events description has been updated.
ATTENDEES_UPDATED: The events max allowed attendees has been updated.
REPEAT_UPDATED: The events repeat setting has been updated.
REMOVE_UPDATED: The events remove attendess on repeat setting has been updated.
DM_UPDATED: The events send reminders in DM setting has been updated.
PLATFORM_UPDATED: The events platform has been updated.
GAME_UPDATED: The events game has been updated.
ACTIVITY_UPDATED: The events activity has been updated.
REMINDERS_UPDATED: The events reminders has been updated.
FREQUENCY_UPDATED: The events frequency has been updated.
DURATION_UPDATED: The events duration has been updated.
START_UPDATED: The events start time has been updated.
ALERTROLE_UPDATED: The events alert roles have been updated.
ALLOWEDROLE_UPDATED: The events allowed roles have been updated.
TEMPLATE_UPDATED: This event is now a template only event.
SHOWATTENDEES_UPDATED: The show attendees option has been updated.
